text: d*@bar=y@hwAh<PAS> '<HPA>SE<MUN>r hAyA<ZQP>h 'El=yw^o'e<TIP>l b*En=p*@tw*'e<SIL>l:

Sim@`w*=zo't<PAS> haz*@qeni<ZQP>ym w@ha<SIL>'<HPA>zi<ZQP>ynw* k*o<TIP>l y<SIL>w^oS@be<MUN>y hA'A<ATN>rEY hEhA<MEH>y@tAh z*o't<PAS> b*i<SIL>ymeykE<ZQP>m w@'i<TIP>m b*iyme<MER>y '<HPA>bo<SIL>teykE<SIL>m:
`AlE<TIP>yhA lib@neykE<MUN>m sap*e<ATN>rw* w*b@neykEm<PAS> lib@neyhE<ZQP>m w*b@neyhE<TIP>m l@d<MER>w^or 'axe<SIL>r:
yE<MEH>tEr hag*AzAm<PAS> 'Aka<MUN>l hA<SIL>'ar@b*E<ZQP>h w@yE<MER>tEr hA<SIL>'ar@b*E<TIP>h 'Aka<MUN>l hay*A<ATN>lEq w@yE<MUN>tEr hay*E<ZQP>lEq 'Aka<TIP>l hE<SIL>xAsi<SIL>yl:
hAqi<MEH>yYw* Sik*w^oriym<PAS> w*b@k<ZQP>w* w@heyli<TIP>lw* k*Al=So<MUN>tey yA<ATN>yin `al=`Asi<ZQM>ys k*i<MER>y nik@ra<TIP>t mip*iykE<SIL>m:
k*iy=gw^oy<PAS> `AlA<MUN>h `al='ar@Yi<ZQP>y `AY<TIP>w*m w@'e<MUN>yn mis@p*A<ATN>r Sin*Ayw<PAS> Sin*e<MUN>y 'ar@ye<ZQP>h w*<SIL>m@tal*@`<MER>w^ot lAbi<TIP>y' l<SIL>w^o:
WA<MEH>m g*ap@niy<PAS> l@Sam*A<ZQP>h w*t@'e<SIL>nAti<TIP>y liq@YApA<ATN>h xAWo<MEH>p x<HPA>WApAh*<PAS> w@hiS@li<ZQP>yk@ hil@b*i<TIP>ynw* WA<SIL>riygE<SIL>yhA:
'<HSE>li<ZQM>y k*ib@tw*lA<MER>h x<HPA>gu<SIL>rat=Wa<TIP>q `al=b*a<MER>`al n@`w*rE<SIL>yhA:
hAk@ra<MER>t min@xA<TEB>h wAnE<TIP>sEk@ mib*e<MUN>yt y@hwA<ATN>h 'A<SIL>b@lw*<PAS> hak*o<MUN>h<HPA>ni<ZQP>ym m@SA<SIL>r@te<TIP>y y@hwA<SIL>h:
Sud*a<MUN>d WAdE<ZQP>h 'A<SIL>b@lA<TIP>h '<HPA>dAmA<ATN>h k*i<YET>y Sud*a<MUN>d d*AgA<ZQP>n hw^obi<MER>yS t*iyr<TIP>w^oS 'um@la<MER>l yiY@hA<SIL>r:
hobi<MUN>ySw* 'ik*Ari<RBM>ym heyli<AZL>ylw*<PAS> k*o<SIL>r@mi<ZQP>ym `al=xiT*A<TIP>h w@`al=W@`orA<ATN>h k*i<MER>y 'Aba<TIP>d q@Yi<MER>yr WAdE<SIL>h:

hag*E<MUN>pEn hw^obi<ZQP>ySAh w@hat*@'enA<TIP>h 'um@lA<ATN>lAh rim*<GAR>w^on g*am=t*AmA<MUN>r w@tap*<RBM>w*xa k*Al=`<HPA>Ye<MEH>y haW/*ׂAdEh<PAS> yAbe<ZQP>Sw* k*i<SIL>y=hobi<MER>yS WAW<TIP>w^on min=b*@ne<MER>y 'AdA<SIL>m:

xig@r<AZL>w* w@sip@d<GER>w* hak*o<SIL>h<HPA>ni<RBM>ym heyli<AZL>ylw*<PAS> m@SA<SIL>r@te<MUN>y miz@b*e<ZQP>xa b*o<YET>'w* li<MUN>ynw* baW/*ׂaq*i<ZQP>ym m@SA<SIL>r@te<TIP>y '<HSE>lohA<ATN>y k*i<MER>y nim@na<TEB>` mib*e<MER>yt '<HSE>lo<SIL>heykE<TIP>m min@xA<MER>h wAnA<SIL>sEk@:

qad*@Sw*=Yw^om<PAS> qir@'<MUN>w* `<HPA>YArA<ZQP>h 'is@p<MUN>w* z@qeni<RBM>ym k*o<YET>l yo<SIL>S@be<MUN>y hA'A<ZQP>rEY b*e<TIP>yt y@hwA<MUN>h '<HSE>lo<SIL>heykE<ATN>m w@za<SIL>`<HPA>q<TIP>w* 'El=y@hwA<SIL>h:
'<HPA>hA<TIP>h* lay*<ATN>w^om k*i<MEH>y qArw^ob<PAS> y<MUN>w^om y@hwA<ZQP>h w*k@So<TIP>d miW/*.ad*a<MER>y yAb<SIL>w^o':
h<HPA>l<TEB>w^o' nE<MER>gEd `eyne<TIP>ynw* 'o<MUN>kEl nik@rA<ATN>t mib*e<MER>yt '<HSE>lohe<TIP>ynw* Wim@xA<MER>h wAgi<SIL>yl:
`A<SIL>b@S<MUN>w* p@rud<RBM>w^ot t*a<YET>xat mEg@r@po<MUN>teyhE<ZQP>m nASa<AZL>m*w*<PAS> 'o<SIL>YAr<ZQP>w^ot nE<SIL>hEr@s<TIP>w* mam*@gur<ATN>w^ot k*i<MER>y hobi<TIP>yS d*AgA<SIL>n:
mah=n*E<SIL>'En@xA<MUN>h b@hemA<RBM>h nAbo<AZL>kw*<PAS> `Ed@re<MUN>y bAqA<ZQP>r k*i<TEB>y 'e<MER>yn mir@`E<TIP>h lAhE<ATN>m g*am=`Ed@re<MER>y haY*o<TIP>'n nE'@SA<SIL>mw*:
'elE<MER>ykA y@hwA<TIP>h 'Eq@rA<ATN>' k*i<MUN>y 'e<RBM>S 'A<SIL>k@lAh<PAS> n@'<MUN>w^ot mid@b*A<ZQP>r w@lE<MUN>hAbA<ZQP>h li<SIL>h<HPA>TA<TIP>h k*Al=`<HPA>Ye<MER>y haW/*ׂAdE<SIL>h:
g*am=b*a<SIL>h<HPA>m<MER>w^ot WAdE<TIP>h t*a<SIL>`<HPA>r<MUN>w^og 'elE<ATN>ykA k*i<MEH>y yA<SIL>b@Sw*<PAS> '<HPA>pi<MUN>yqey mA<ZQP>yim w@'e<ZQM>S 'A<SIL>k@lA<TIP>h n@'<MER>w^ot ham*id@b*A<SIL>r:

t*iq@`<AZL>w* Sw^opA<GER>r b*@Yiy*<RBM>w^on w@hAri<AZL>y`w*<PAS> b*@ha<MUN>r qAd@Si<ZQP>y yir@g*@z<ZQM>w* k*o<TIP>l yo<SIL>S@be<MUN>y hA'A<ATN>rEY k*iy=bA<MER>' yw^om=y@hwA<TIP>h k*i<MER>y qAr<SIL>w^ob:

y<DAR>w^om xo<MUN>SEk@ wa<SIL>'<HPA>pelA<RBM>h y<MEH>w^om `AnAn<PAS> wa<SIL>`<HPA>rApE<ZQP>l k*@Sa<TIP>xar p*Aru<MUN>W `al=hE<SIL>hAri<ATN>ym `a<YET>m ra<MUN>b w@`AY<ZQP>w*m k*Amo<RBM>hw* lo<MEH>' ni<SIL>h@yAh<PAS> min=hA<MUN>`w^olA<ZQP>m w@'a<SIL>x<HPA>rAyw<PAS> lo<MUN>' yw^ose<ZQP>p `ad=S@ne<TIP>y d*<MER>w^or wAd<SIL>w^or:

l@pAnAyw<PAS> 'A<MUN>k@lAh 'e<ZQP>S w@'a<SIL>x<HPA>rA<TIP>yw t*@lahe<MUN>T lE<SIL>hAbA<ATN>h k*@gan=`e<AZL>dEn hA'A<GER>rEY l@pAnA<RBM>yw w@'a<SIL>x<HPA>rAyw<PAS> mid@b*a<MUN>r S@mAmA<ZQP>h w@gam=p*@leyTA<TIP>h lo'=hA<MER>y@tAh l*<SIL>w^o:
k*@mar@'e<MER>h sw*si<TIP>ym mar@'e<ATN>hw* w*k@pA<SIL>rASi<TIP>ym k*e<MER>n y@rw*Y<SIL>w*n:

k*@q<MUN>w^ol mar@k*Ab<RBM>w^ot `al=rA'Se<MEH>y hE<SIL>hAriym<PAS> y@raq*ed<ZQP>w*n k*@qw^ol<PAS> la<MUN>hab 'e<ZQP>S 'o<SIL>k@lA<TIP>h qA<ATN>S k*@`a<MUN>m `AY<ZQP>w*m `<HSE>r<TIP>w*k@ mil@xAmA<SIL>h:
mip*AnA<TIP>yw yAxi<MUN>ylw* `am*i<ATN>ym k*Al=p*Ani<TIP>ym qib*@Y<MER>w* pA'r<SIL>w*r:
k*@gib*w^ori<MUN>ym y@ruY<ZQP>w*n k*@'an@Se<MER>y mil@xAmA<TIP>h ya<SIL>`<HPA>l<MUN>w* xw^omA<ATN>h w@'i<MEH>yS b*id@rAkAyw<PAS> ye<SIL>lek<ZQP>w*n w@lo<MER>' y@`ab*@T<TIP>w*n 'o<SIL>r@xw^otA<SIL>m:
w@'i<MEH>yS 'Axiyw<PAS> lo<MUN>' yid@xAq<ZQP>w*n g*E<MER>bEr b*im@sil*At<TIP>w^o ye<SIL>lek<ATN>w*n w*b@`a<MER>d haW/*.E<TEB>lax yip*o<TIP>lw* lo<MER>' yib@YA<SIL>`w*:
b*A`i<MUN>yr yASo<RBM>q*w* b*a<SIL>xw^omAh<PAS> y@ruY<ZQP>w*n b*ab*At*i<TIP>ym ya<SIL>`<HPA>l<ATN>w* b*@`a<DAR>d ha<SIL>xal*w^oni<TEB>ym yAbo<TIP>'w* k*ag*an*A<SIL>b:
l@pAnAyw<PAS> rA<MUN>g@zAh 'E<ZQP>rEY rA<SIL>`<HPA>S<TIP>w* SAmA<ATN>yim SE<MEH>mES w@yAre<AZL>xa<PAS> qAdA<ZQP>rw* w@k<SIL>w^okAbi<TIP>ym 'A<SIL>s@p<MER>w* nAg@hA<SIL>m:

wa<SIL>yhwA<RBM>h nAta<MEH>n qw^olw^o<PAS> lip@ne<MUN>y xeyl<ZQP>w^o k*i<MUN>y ra<MEH>b m@'od<PAS> ma<SIL>x<HPA>ne<ZQP>hw* k*i<MER>y `AY<TIP>w*m `oWe<MUN>h d@bAr<ATN>w^o k*i<SIL>y=gAd<DAR>w^ol yw^om=y@hwA<TEB>h w@nw^orA<MER>' m@'o<TIP>d w*mi<MER>y y@kiylE<SIL>n*w*:
w@gam=`at*Ah<PAS> n@'um=y@hwA<ZQP>h Su<MER>bw* `Ada<TIP>y b*@kAl=l@bab@kE<ATN>m w*b@Y<MER>w^om w*bib@ki<TIP>y w*b@mis@p*e<SIL>d:

w@qir@`<MEH>w* l@bab@kEm<PAS> w@'al=b*ig@deykE<ZQP>m w@S<TIP>w*bw* 'El=y@hwA<MUN>h '<HSE>lo<SIL>heykE<ATN>m k*i<SIL>y=xan*<MEH>w*n w@raxw*m<PAS> h<ZQP>w*' 'E<MEH>rEk@ 'ap*a<AZL>yim<PAS> w@rab=xE<ZQP>sEd w@nixA<TIP>m `al=hA<SIL>rA`A<SIL>h:
mi<MER>y yw^ode<TIP>`a yAS<MUN>w*b w@nixA<ATN>m w@hiS@'i<MEH>yr 'a<SIL>x<HPA>rAyw<PAS> b*@rAkA<ZQP>h min@xA<MUN>h wAnE<ZQP>sEk@ la<SIL>yhwA<TIP>h '<HSE>lo<SIL>heykE<SIL>m:
t*iq@`<MER>w* Sw^opA<TIP>r b*@Yiy*<ATN>w^on qad*@Sw*=Y<TIP>w^om qir@'<MER>w* `<HPA>YArA<SIL>h:

'is@pw*=`A<GAR>m qad*@S<MEH>w* qAhAl<PAS> qib@Y<MUN>w* z@qeni<ZQP>ym 'is@pw*<PAS> `<SIL>w^olAli<ZQP>ym w@yo<SIL>n@qe<TIP>y SAdA<ATN>yim yeYe<MEH>' xAtAn<PAS> me<SIL>xEd@r<ZQP>w^o w@kal*A<TIP>h mexup*AtA<SIL>h*:

b*e<MEH>yn hA<SIL>'w*lAm<PAS> w@lam*iz@b*e<ZQP>xa yib@k*w*<PAS> hak*o<MUN>h<HPA>ni<ZQP>ym m@SA<SIL>r@te<TIP>y y@hwA<ATN>h w@<SIL>yo'm@r<GAR>w* x<DAR>w*sAh y@hwA<MUN>h `al=`am*E<RBM>kA w@'al=t*it*e<AZL>n nax<HPA>lA<SIL>t@kA<MEH> l@xEr@p*Ah<PAS> lim@SAl=b*A<MUN>m g*w^oyi<ZQP>m lA<YET>m*Ah yo<SIL>'m@r<MUN>w* bA<SIL>`am*i<ZQP>ym 'ay*e<TIP>h '<HSE>lo<SIL>heyhE<SIL>m:
way@qan*e<MER>' y@hwA<TIP>h l@'ar@Y<ATN>w^o way*ax@mo<TIP>l `al=`am*<SIL>w^o:

way*a<AZL>`an y@hwA<GER>h way*o<MUN>'mEr l@`am*<RBM>w^o hin@ni<AZL>y Sole<MEH>xa lAkEm<PAS> 'Et=had*AgAn<PAS> w@hat*iyr<MUN>w^oS w@hay*iY@hA<ZQP>r w*W@ba`@t*E<TIP>m 'ot<ATN>w^o w@lo<SIL>'='Et*e<AZL>n 'Et@kE<MER>m `<TEB>w^od xEr@p*A<TIP>h b*ag*w^oyi<SIL>m:

w@<SIL>'Et=haY*@pw^oni<GAR>y 'ar@xi<MUN>yq me<SIL>`<HPA>leykE<RBM>m w@hid*ax@t*iyw<ZIN> 'El='E<MUN>rEY Yiy*A<MUN>h w*S@mAmAh<AST> 'Et=p*AnA<RBM>yw 'El=hay*Am<PAS> haq*ad@moni<ZQP>y w@sop<TIP>w^o 'El=hay*A<MUN>m hA'a<SIL>x<HPA>r<ATN>w^on w@`AlA<MUN>h bA'@S<RBM>w^o w@ta<AZL>`al<PAS> Ya<SIL>x<HPA>nAt<ZQP>w^o k*i<MER>y hig@d*i<TIP>yl la<SIL>`<HPA>W<SIL>w^ot:
'al=t*i<SIL>yr@'i<TIP>y '<HPA>dAmA<ATN>h g*i<MUN>yliy w*W@mA<ZQP>xiy k*i<SIL>y=hig@d*i<MER>yl y@hwA<TIP>h la<SIL>`<HPA>W<SIL>w^ot:

'al=t*i<SIL>yr@'w*<PAS> b*a<SIL>h<HPA>m<MUN>w^ot WAda<ZQP>y k*i<MER>y dA<SIL>S@'<TIP>w* n@'<MUN>w^ot mid@b*A<ATN>r k*iy=`eY<PAS> nAWA<MUN>' pir@y<ZQP>w^o t*@'enA<MER>h wAgE<TIP>pEn nA<SIL>t@n<MER>w* xeylA<SIL>m:

w*b@ne<MUN>y Yiy*<RBM>w^on g*i<MEH>ylw* w@Wim@xw*<PAS> b*a<SIL>yhwA<MUN>h '<HSE>lo<SIL>heykE<ZQP>m k*i<SIL>y=nAta<MER>n lAkE<TEB>m 'Et=ham*w^orE<TIP>h liY@dAqA<ATN>h way*<MUN>w^orEd lAkE<RBM>m g*E<TEB>SEm mw^orE<MER>h w*mal@q<TIP>w^oS b*A<SIL>ri'S<SIL>w^on:
w*mA<SIL>l@'<MER>w* hag*<HQA>rAn<TIP>w^ot b*A<ATN>r w@heSi<MER>yqw* hay@qAbi<TIP>ym t*iyr<MER>w^oS w@yiY@hA<SIL>r:

w@Sil*am@t*i<MEH>y lAkEm<PAS> 'Et=haW/*.Ani<ZQP>ym '<HPA>SEr<PAS> 'Aka<MUN>l hA<SIL>'ar@b*E<ZQP>h hay*E<TIP>lEq w@hE<SIL>xAsi<MUN>yl w@hag*AzA<ATN>m xeyliy<PAS> hag*Ad<ZQP>w^ol '<HPA>SE<MER>r Sil*a<TIP>x@t*iy b*AkE<SIL>m:

wa<SIL>'<HPA>kal@t*E<MEH>m 'Akw^ol<PAS> w@WAb<ZQP>w^o`a w@hil*al@t*E<RBM>m 'Et=Se<MEH>m y@hwAh<PAS> '<HSE>lo<MUN>heykE<ZQP>m '<HPA>SEr=`AWA<MER>h `im*AkE<TIP>m l@hap@li<ATN>y' w@lo<SIL>'=yebo<MER>Sw* `am*i<TIP>y l@`w^olA<SIL>m:

wi<SIL>yda`@t*E<RBM>m k*i<MUN>y b@qE<MEH>rEb yiW@rA'el<PAS> 'A<ZQP>niy wa<SIL>'<HPA>ni<TEB>y y@hwA<MER>h '<HSE>lo<SIL>heykE<TIP>m w@'e<MUN>yn `<ATN>w^od w@lo<SIL>'=yebo<MER>Sw* `am*i<TIP>y l@`w^olA<SIL>m:

w@hAyA<MUN>h 'a<SIL>x<HPA>rey=ke<RBM>n 'ES@p*<MEH>w^ok@ 'Et=rw*xiy<PAS> `al=k*Al=b*AWA<ZQP>r w@nib*@'<TIP>w* b*@neykE<MUN>m w*b@n<SIL>w^oteykE<ATN>m ziq@neykEm<PAS> x<HPA>lom<MUN>w^ot ya<SIL>x<HPA>lom<ZQP>w*n b*ax<MUN>w*reykE<ZQP>m xEz@yon<TIP>w^ot yir@'<SIL>w*:
w@ga<MER>m `al=hA<SIL>`<HPA>bAdi<TIP>ym w@`al=haW/*.@pAx<ATN>w^ot b*ay*Ami<MUN>ym hAhe<ZQP>m*Ah 'ES@p*<TIP>w^ok@ 'Et=rw*xi<SIL>y:
w@nA<SIL>tat*iy<PAS> m<SIL>w^op@ti<ZQP>ym b*aW/*.Ama<TIP>yim w*bA'A<ATN>rEY d*A<MUN>m wA'e<ZQP>S w@ti<SIL>ym@r<TIP>w^ot `ASA<SIL>n:
haW/*.E<AZL>mES<PAS> ye<SIL>hApe<MUN>k@ l@xo<ZQP>SEk@ w@hay*Are<TIP>xa l@dA<ATN>m lip@ne<RBM>y b*<YET>w^o' y<MUN>w^om y@hwA<ZQP>h hag*Ad<TIP>w^ol w@han*w^orA<SIL>':

w@hAyA<RBM>h k*o<DAR>l '<HPA>SEr=yiq@rA<TEB>' b*@Se<MER>m y@hwA<TIP>h yim*Ale<ATN>T k*i<TLM>y b*@har=Yiy*<AZL>w^on w*biyr<SIL>w*SAla<GER>im t*i<SIL>h@yE<MUN>h p@leyTA<RBM>h k*a<SIL>'<HPA>SEr<PAS> 'Ama<MUN>r y@hwA<ZQP>h w*ba<AZL>W/*ׂ@riydi<ZQP>ym '<HPA>SE<MER>r y@hwA<TIP>h qore<SIL>':
k*i<RBM>y hin*e<TEB>h b*ay*Ami<MER>ym hAhe<TIP>m*Ah w*bA`e<MUN>t hahi<ATN>y' '<HPA>SE<MER>r 'W/wb ('ASi<TEB>yb) 'Et=S@b<MER>w*t y@hw*dA<TIP>h wiyr<SIL>w*SAlA<SIL>im:

w@qib*aY@t*iy<PAS> 'Et=k*Al=hag*w^oyi<ZQP>m w@h<MUN>w^orad@t*i<ZQP>ym 'El=`e<TIP>mEq y@h<SIL>w^oSApA<ATN>T w@niS@p*aT@t*i<AZL>y `im*A<GER>m SA<RBM>m `al=`am*i<AZL>y w@na<SIL>x<HPA>lAti<MEH>y yiW@rA'el<PAS> '<HPA>SE<MUN>r p*iz*@r<MUN>w* bag*w^oyi<ZQP>m w@'Et='ar@Yi<TIP>y xil*e<SIL>qw*:
w@'El=`am*i<TIP>y yad*<MUN>w* gw^orA<ATN>l wa<SIL>y*it*@n<MEH>w* hay*E<AZL>lEd<PAS> b*az*w^onA<ZQP>h w@hay*al@d*A<TEB>h mA<SIL>k@r<MER>w* bay*a<TIP>yin way*iS@t*<SIL>w*:

w@<TLM>gam mAh='at*E<MER>m liy<PAS> Yo<MUN>r w@Yiyd<ZQP>w^on w@ko<TIP>l g*@liyl<MUN>w^ot p*@lA<ATN>SEt hag*@m<RBM>w*l 'at*Em<PAS> m@Sal*@mi<MUN>ym `AlA<ZQP>y w@'im=g*o<SIL>m@li<MEH>ym 'at*Em<PAS> `Ala<ZQP>y qa<MUN>l m@herA<ZQP>h 'ASi<MER>yb g*@mu<SIL>l@kE<TIP>m b*@ro<SIL>'S@kE<SIL>m:
'<HPA>SEr=k*as@p*i<MER>y w*z@hAbi<TIP>y l@qax@t*E<ATN>m w*ma<SIL>x<HPA>mad*ay<PAS> haT*obi<ZQP>ym h<HPA>be'tE<TIP>m l@he<SIL>yk@leykE<SIL>m:
